casebody.data:
James STEWART, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. UNITED STATES SHIPPING BOARD MERCHANT FLEET CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellant. No. 293. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 6, 1930. Charles H. Tuttle, TT. S. Atty., of New York City (Frederick H. Cunningham, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment reversed in open court.
